tool_description: FlightsLogic provides Flight API, Airline Consolidator, Flight Aggregator to the travel agents, tour operators and travel companies worldwide.
name: Flight , Airline Consolidator, Flight Aggregator
title: Flight , Airline Consolidator, Flight Aggregator

api_list.name: Flight aggregator
api_list.description: FlightsLogic Global Airfare APIs connect you to the finest information in the travel industry. You can now build, innovate and launch your web and Mobile applications with our Flight API. Inspirational search features combine our Global Airfare APIs with your existing travel offering to complement your product range.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flight-airline-consolidator-flight-aggregator.p.rapidapi.comhttps://flightslogic.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flight-airline-consolidator-flight-aggregator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
